title: Hello_World.txt
excerpt: Initializing the system. Why I chose a static text aesthetic for 2025.
content:
Welcome to The Digital Levite.

In an age of bloat, trackers, and infinite scrolling feeds, I wanted to carve out a quiet corner of the internet. A place that feels like the medium I respect mostâ€”ink on paper, clear thought, and no distractions.

This site is intentionally stripped down. No comments section to moderate. No analytics scripts watching your mouse movements. Just text, code, and a bit of vibe.

Status: ONLINE.

title: Discovery
excerpt: The most precious thing I received was the discovery that I am neurodivergent.
content:
The most precious thing I received in my 49th year, was the discovery that I am likely gifted, AuDHD.

In my 50th year, I was restored to who I always knew I was, without apologies. And joy returned.

With 51 peeking from the corner, I am returning to scattered, abandoned projects, like writing..
